name: agnosticui
description: Component primitives first coded in semantic HTML and CSS, then copied over to React, Vue, Svelte, and Angular (experimental) implementations. CSS properties themable.

scripts.build:css: npm run stylelint && pushd agnostic-css && npm run build && popd
scripts.sync:angular: pushd agnostic-angular && npm run syncStyles && popd
scripts.sync:react: pushd agnostic-react && npm run syncStyles && popd
scripts.sync:vue: pushd agnostic-vue && npm run syncStyles && popd
scripts.sync:svelte: pushd agnostic-svelte && npm run syncStyles && popd
scripts.sync: npm run stylelint && npm run build:css && npm run sync:react && npm run sync:angular && npm run sync:vue && npm run sync:svelte
scripts.lint:angular: pushd agnostic-angular && npm run lint && popd
scripts.lint:react: pushd agnostic-react && npm run lint && popd
scripts.lint:svelte: pushd agnostic-svelte && npm run lint && popd
scripts.lint:vue: pushd agnostic-vue && npm run lint && popd
scripts.lint: npm run lint:react && npm run lint:angular && npm run lint:svelte && npm run lint:vue && npm run stylelint
scripts.stylelint: pushd agnostic-css && npm run stylelint && popd
scripts.test:angular: pushd agnostic-angular && npm run test && popd
scripts.test:react: pushd agnostic-react && npm run test && popd
scripts.test:vue: pushd agnostic-vue && npm run test && popd
scripts.test: npm run sync:react && npm run test:react
scripts.start:css: pushd agnostic-css && npm run start && popd
scripts.start:angular: npm run build:css && pushd agnostic-angular && npm run storybook && popd
scripts.start:react: npm run build:css && pushd agnostic-react && npm run storybook && popd
scripts.start:vue: npm run build:css && pushd agnostic-vue && npm run storybook && popd
scripts.start:svelte: npm run build:css && pushd agnostic-svelte && npm run storybook && popd
scripts.start:site: cd site && npm run docs:dev && popd
